pr_title: chore: add basic validation for table upgrades (MINOR)

timeline.message: chore: add basic validation for table upgrades

timeline.body:
This will likely results in the _order_ of entries in the returned list changing from what it was before, and not being non-deterministic. 

Not sure if this is important, just flagging as a potential unforeseen side effect of the change.

replies.bodyText: good call, I will change this as I think it might be what's actually causing the QTT for some other things to fail
